website_summaries.verdict: A grill and griddle in one that successfully minimizes smoke.
pros: Grids quickly snap in and out for easy removal
Multiple temperature controls allow for flexibility and precise results
Offers three cooking options: as a grill, as a griddle, or as a grill and griddle combo
cons: May take longer to prepare food than other products

website_summaries.verdict: A highly rated, low-cost appliance. Has an advantage over basic Prestos in that it offers grilling as well as griddling.
pros: Offers the versatility of using either a full griddle (flat plates), full grill (ridged plates), or one of each

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: After using this grill, I am not completely happy with the product. First, the positive elements: heats quickly to desired temp., two plates system is great, reversible plate features helpful, non-stick aspect makes cleanup easier. The negative features: grill plate release system borders on dangerous because the grill plate attachments are shape-edged, stiff and can cut fingers when attaching or detaching plates. I recommend that the manufacturer make rubber or plastic covers for those pieces, and send them to purchasers ASAP. This system of attaching and releasing grill plates is too ackward and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Callee

customer_reviews.title: My wife was extremely happy with the dual temp controls
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is BIG. Read the instructions for assembly and configuration. The instructions are very well laid out. My wife was extremely happy with the dual temp controls. I liked the dual faces griddles, the slotted meat griddle sides are sloped so that grease drains to the center drip pan. the flat sides are not sloped making it easier to cook pancakes and eggs. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Love? Can you love a grill? Because I do!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews have stated that grease runs into the coils... this is so if you aren't using the product right! As a food service professional I love this. Easy to use after long night and early mornings. The grease or liquids drain properly if it goes through the drain hole. If you let it overflow on the top or bottom your screwed and it's very difficult to clean up but it's very easy if you use it right! Love that I can just pop the grill plates into the dishwasher and start my day!
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Anne

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.  Fire Hazard!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flimsy. The controls are so cheap they feel as though they are going to break everytime you use them. Very uneven cooking and poor temperature regulation. Too small to cook more than a single meal. So small that you need to cut bacon strips in half to fit on it. The coating seems non stick right now but does not look durable at all. Update 12/02/2018 WARNING-FIRE HAZARD!!!!!! The poor design of oil/grease drip collection almost led to a fire! The oil/grease when stir frying can easily collect under the heating elements and catch fire! Very poor design. These things need to be pulled from the stores and reviewed for safety!!!
customer_reviews.author: C2CPILOT

customer_reviews.title: Everything Sticks; Much Smaller Than Standard Griddle
customer_reviews.text: The only plus I can give this griddle is the ability to control the temperature separately on each side. It is so small I can barely fit 2 pancakes on one side. In the year I have owned this, I never used the grill side of the plates. But I got so tired of chiseling my pancakes on the griddle, I tossed it in the trash yesterday after Sunday breakfast. The "nonstick" plates have NEVER lived up to their name. I "seasoned" the plates properly, and even after oiling them, I couldn't get a pancake or egg off without destroying them. Absolutely ridiculous! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN S.

customer_reviews.title: Electrocuted me
customer_reviews.text: I have this thing less than a year. Yesterday, I was electrocuted by it. My toe touched my stove while I was flipping a pancake and I must have completed a circuit. There must be a short somewhere in it. Will contact manufacturer as well. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie0878

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love this griddle! When you are done with it, you just unsnap the plates and throw em in the dishwasher. It heats up quickly and, cools down when you're finished in record time.The only drawback is, it is a little tricky to get the plates snapped in and out when assembling for use or flipping from griddle to grill. Also, the non-stick coating is not the best but, it's not been too big a problem since we watch over our food.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Versatile usage. Easy cleanup. Brilliant!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and easy to use right out of the box. I really enjoy using this appliance. Although it takes a few minutes to warm up, it’s good to go for any and every type of meal prep. Love the dual heat controls. Whether it’s just a cooked breakfast treat, indoor SMOKELESS grilling, grilled veggies or whatever, it’s definitely up to the task and the cleanup is so easy compared to other griddle/grills I’ve tried. Non stick surfaces work perfectly on both sides of the plates which can be easily removed for cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnsy

customer_reviews.title: Grill/Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to "grill" inside and the griddle side is awesome for sandwiches or quesadillas, etc. They clean easily and work for cooking so many items. It's also a plus having a control knob on each side because I'm usually just cooking for myself so I only use one side--a big plus. This item was great for the price and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for healthy cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill...originally purchased the first one to cook fish and veggies for a Korean bar-b-que dinner party I was planning. Hubby and I gave it a try to see if it would fit the need. I purchased another one because it worked so well .Now we can have 3 couples cooking at one time .....It cleans up fast and easy......
customer_reviews.author: Moodoll

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is a fire hazard. Read the numerous reviews about cooking grease leaking onto the heating element. They are 100% true. We’ve used the grill for a week and it’s going in the garbage. It’s poorly designed and dangerous. Shame on you Hamilton Beach for selling such a deeply flawed and dangerous product!
customer_reviews.author: Scofan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Griddle!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is fantastic! We use it for camping in and outside our RV. Super easy cleanup and my wife enjoys using it at home. You really can cook about anything on this! I'm glad i took the chance on this and did not listen to the negative reviews. As long as you snap the grill plates in correctly which is super simple and you keep it level you will have no trouble with anything leaking where it does not need to leak. Also this is fun for the kids to cook on and watching them make super huge pancakes!!
customer_reviews.author: John Graham

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Junk. Terrible. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Hate this thing, threw it out the door the 3rd time I used it. Grease does not drain like it’s supposed to, drains on to burners and burns. Smokes up whole house. Cord is way to short has to be right on top of outlet to reach. Does not cook evenly at all, one burner burns way hotter than opposite when on same setting. Don’t waste your time, a piece of trash is all this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This item is actually pretty fun to use, I especially enjoyed making hotdogs on it. But the durability is laughable. This thing practically fell apart after about two months with regular cleaning. The dials broke off and the red light cover fell off. I didn’t feel safe having it in my house and got rid of it
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The temperature controls busted off the third time we used this grill. It also allowed the grease to drain under to the actual burners and caused smoke and grease staining. Waste of money. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: JesseD

customer_reviews.title: find a better griddle

customer_reviews.author: sreyes

customer_reviews.title: Indoor grilling is a bit messy, but it works almost as well as our outdoor grill.
customer_reviews.text: It works well for indoor grilling, but the grease splatter makes a mess. I use it in the middle of my cooktop range and place paper towels around it to absorb the grease. It also helps to limit the splatter and speed up the time if you place a lid over the food while cooking. My exhaust hood controls the little bit of smoke that comes from the frying.

customer_reviews.author: Morris A. Till IV

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I would like to have an ON/OFF switch. You plug it in and the power light comes on and there is not really a off position for the temperature dial. The plates are kind of hard to remover, they clip in pretty hard. Other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfman

customer_reviews.title: The clips to keep the plates are sharp so be careful and spray the grills with nonstick.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I was looking for something to grill on instead of starting up the big outside grill and this is perfect, while you can also use it for making pancakes, eggs and bacon. If used correctly the grease does drip down in the trap nicely with no spillage onto the heating elements. And food does not stick to the grills if sprayed with nonstick. I don't know how all these other people had the problems they had with this product that they had. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST BEFORE USING. and you will have no problems and you will enjoy the grill.

customer_reviews.title: This grill is so unique!

customer_reviews.title: This one is a bit smaller than most and I hate that it doesn't really fold up for storage

The plates are nice that they are grill or griddle, but in comparison to other griddles out there, this just isn't worth the buck. It also irks me that you can't power off one side or another. Once you turn it on, it's on. Other models offer the option to power off one side if you aren't using it.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this! I had put this on my daughters ...

The only down side is I do wish it got a little hotter but it still sears really well!

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling and breakfast

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase

customer_reviews.title: NOT non-stick

The key word here is NONSTICK, the griddle surface is definately NOT nonstick. You would have better non-stick cooking on a greased cast iron skillet than on this griddle.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for our life

The surface is so durable that I came back here to see if it was actually cast iron (it isn't). There are only two of us, so we have plenty of room for bacon, sausage,etc on one side and 4 eggs on the other. We have never had grease flow anywhere but the grease pan.
customer_reviews.author: John Howell

customer_reviews.title: Just ok

The issues have with are that it takes a long time to heat up to cooking temp (took me 40 mins for 1 lb of thicker bacon) and the size isn’t large enough. I liked my old ceramic presto tilt and drain better!
customer_reviews.author: Imgoingcamping!

customer_reviews.title: I hand washed it before use very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Package came in time arrived well unbroken/no missing parts. I hand washed it before use very easy to clean. First time use grilled chicken and steak and it taste like off the grill and it gives prefect grill marks if your big on that. I love it so far 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Griddle good
customer_reviews.text: I like this grill easy to use & very easy to clean the only complaint I have is the grill/griddle takes a long time to heat to cooking temperature .

customer_reviews.title: Worst piece of cookware I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of cookware I've ever purchased. Nonstick coating is complete bs. Didn't prevent anything from sticking, then had to scrub the food that stuck to it and ended up removing whatever 'non-stick' coating there was, off even more. The reversible trays are a great idea but the drainage sucks, instead of going into the drip pan it travels underneath and into where the heating elements are.

customer_reviews.title: at first I thought it would be great, and a great idea
customer_reviews.text: at first I thought it would be great, and a great idea. but it is very small and had a hard time trying to fit everything on it for a breakfast for 4. wish I had looked around a little more, as I would not have bought this one. it's used now so I can't return. nice idea if It was just me.

customer_reviews.title: I fell like the only thing we can safely cook on this ...

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...

customer_reviews.text: Have had this item since Jan of 2017, and have probably used it a total of 20 times. The 'non-stick' surface did not stay non-stick and we had to use spray oil for everything to make sure it did not stick. All with hand washing the cook surfaces, so no dishwasher abrasion. The left burner no longer works, and we are currently looking to replace this unit. Not very happy with it at all, as it should have lasted more than 20-30 uses. When it worked, it was decent.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mollahan

customer_reviews.title: Junk

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery

Sausages don't roll off into the center, the slopes aren't nearly as bad as a particular boxer's invention, but I love them both.
customer_reviews.author: AvgJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a replacement for an old one we had (not this brand) where one side stopped working. It's very easy to clean, easy to use, heats evenly, and I love that you have the different plate option. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: It cooks evenly cleans up very easily. Great for using in the winter when it's ...

customer_reviews.title: This Grill is not so hot
customer_reviews.text: I like this grill for the griddle side. It makes great pancakes. The problem, is when using the grill side of the plates, they do not hold their temperature for very long. The indicator lights go out and you have to keep waiting on the temperature to get back up to where you were cooking at the start. I wouldn't recommend anyone else to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Will buy this thing again if it breaks!

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he uses it more than any other item in our kitchen. Haha my only complaint is that the temperature markers on the knobs wore off within a week of us owning it. Other than that it's a great product.

customer_reviews.text: cheap, shoddy construction. This is a high temperature cooking item, but so poorly made I sent it back as I felt it was dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Anthroariel

customer_reviews.title: Potential fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept of the removable plates but I to find it leaks oil everywhere on the counter and now the temperatures on the knobs are coming off so you can’t tell the temperature. I hope they improve the design because I am also concerned about fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At first this griddle was great and we were really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: At first this griddle was great and we were really happy with this purchase. We make breakfast every weekend but by the 3rd time using this it started to smoke. We noticed that the bacon grease can seep below the plates and hits the heating coil. The thing smokes so much now we can't use it. We have tried using cleaners but it's impossible to get in between every part of the heating coil. This turned out to be a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: NON STICK SURFACE IS TERRIBLE. EVERYTHING STICKS TO IT AND CLEANING IS A HUGE PROCESS.
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WILL PROBABLY WORK IF YOU NEVER COOK AT HIGH TEMP. AT THE FIRST ATTEMPT TO COOK AT FULL HIGH, THE NON STICK SURFACE GAVE WAY. I LITERALLY THREW THE ITEM AWAY A MONTH AFTER I BOUGHT IT. DESIGN IS GOOD IN THEORY. SHAME THE CHEAP COOKING SURFACE STEALS THE SHOW.. IN A BAD WAY.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Unplug it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice griddle. Easy to use and temperature control is pretty accurate. The only issue I have with it is that you can’t turn off the griddle with the temperature dials - it has to be unplugged to turn off. Sounds like a fire hazard???
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I hate this griddle
customer_reviews.text: I hate this griddle! Its hard to put together. Hard to take apart. The light button broke the first day we used it. Grease drains down by the heating element, which IMO is a fire hazard. The surface area is so small and it doesn't heat evenly. Save your money and buy a standard cheap griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinjax

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this item.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. Everything sticks to the supposed non stick surface. It is difficult to clean. Do not waste your money on this product. I am not the type of person who writes reviews on products purchased, but on this one I felt compelled too. When bacon sticks to a griddle you know you have a clunker
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Bellistri

customer_reviews.title: Easy breakfast food prep!!
customer_reviews.text: Great appliance, very handy. Purchased as a family Christmas gift from Santa. We have used several times since then for breakfast items only ... French toast, pancakes, fried eggs. Heats up quickly, cleans up easily, nice storage. Would be even more awesome if it folded in half for less storage space. Shipped within time frame expected & packaged appropriately. Would purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What It should be
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment and i don't have a year, so this appliance is used all the time. I can still grill my chicken and burgers and the grease trap is so convenient for cleaning. Very versatile for the fact you can use both a griddle and a grill at the same time or have two of each. Having the ability to turn on half of it is helpful for both the usage of electricity and for when i only cook for myself. Also is great for cooking for groups, for example i've done fajitas and this thing was terrific for getting all the chicken grilled. Very happy with it, and its not heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hoernle

customer_reviews.title: The good thing about it is the removeable grill plates that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. I have one that is a year old. Cooking oil removes the temperature numbers from the dials quickly. You then have to guess what the setting it is on. It also allows grease to get on top of the heating elements and inside the unit. The good thing about it is the removeable grill plates that you can soak in the sink. I don't expect it to last another year. I'll probably buy another brand as a replacement. Most of these portable grills seem to turn into junk in a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Interkonnektion

customer_reviews.title: Best Griddle and Grill ever.
customer_reviews.text: My son had one of these and I used it and order one for myself after using his.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really poor grill especially how the grease runs into the drip ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really poor grill especially how the grease runs into the drip container and then into the inside of the griddle making it very hard to clean that area where the heat filaments are. Just a bad design. It looks like a premium griddle and we should have just stuck with the tried and tru basic griddle as they are easy to clean and last about the same for a lot less $'s.

I'm so happy!

customer_reviews.text: I found this griddle does not clean up well. Plates are not easy to remove or put back in place after cleaning. Plan to throw this griddle away and purchase a new one.

customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is ok, kind of easy clean up, the only thing is the temperature seems to fluctuate, and it does take a very long time to warm up, so to use I’d normally have to warm it up ahead of time about 15 minutes first .... that was disappointing.
